name: Dark Tales: Buried Alive Free
description:
It’s ain’t another cold case! It’s all happening right here, right now! A horrifying story of a sudden death and a ruthless crime! An innocent victim buried alive… But it’s still not too late! Bend every effort, leave no stone unturned and rescue a poor young lady from the arms of death!

• GET TO THE BOTTOM OF A HELLISH CRIME!
Become a detective's assistant and help him solve this sophisticated crime! Find objects, solve puzzles, watch the characters around you and pay attention to their every move!

• CHALLENGE YOURSELF WITH A WONDERFUL ADVENTURE!
Enjoy a variety of in-depth hidden object scenes and crack challenging puzzles across 35 thrilling locations! Dark Tales: The Premature Burial is a treat for the brain and a feast for both eyes and ears!

• GET A MARVELOUS BONUS!
This time Collector’s Edition features a helpful strategy guide along with a set of stunning wallpapers and sketches, a wonderful soundtrack and, of course, a Bonus Chapter with more locations to explore and objects to find!

So, what are you waiting for?


The READ_PHONE_STATE permission is used to generate unique hash of a device. No private data is being stored anywhere.
